name: Crypt of the Serpent King
description: Crypt of the Serpent King is a medieval first-person hack'n'slash dungeon crawler with roguelike elements. Explore randomly generated dungeons, fighting underworld creatures along the way, all while avoiding traps and collecting loot!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 with Shader Model 3.0 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Quad Core 3 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 with Feature Level 9.3 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
